text: Au cœur du stade (English: At the Heart of the Stadium) is a live album by Canadian singer Céline Dion. It was released on August 27, 1999. == Track listing == 1\. "Let's Talk About Love" (Bryan Adams, Jean-Jacques Goldman, Elliott Kennedy) – 7:39 2\. "Dans un autre monde" (Goldman) – 4:26 3\. "Je sais pas" (Goldman, J. Kapler) – 5:47 4\. "Je crois toi" (Goldman) – 4:36 5\. "Terre" (Erick Benzi) – 4:26 6\. "J'irai où tu iras" (with Jean-Jacques Goldman) (Goldman) – 4:06 7\. "S'il suffisait d'aimer" (Goldman) – 5:10 8\. "On ne change pas" (Goldman) – 6:03 9\. Medley acoustique: :"Ce n'était qu'un rêve" (Thérèse Dion, Céline Dion, Jacques Dion) – 1:18 :"D'amour ou d'amitié" (Eddy Marnay, Jean Pierre Lang, Roland Vincent) – 2:01 :"Mon ami m'a quittée" (Marnay, Christian Loigerot, Thierry Geoffroy) – 1:58 :"L'amour existe encore" (Luc Plamondon, Richard Cocciante) – 2:05 :"Un garçon pas comme les autres (Ziggy)" (Plamondon, Michel Berger) – 3:21 10."Pour que tu m'aimes encore" (Goldman) – 5:20 11."My Heart Will Go On" (James Horner, Will Jennings) – 5:23 == Release history == Region Date Label Format Catalog Europe August 27, 1999 Sony Music, Columbia CD 4952402 Canada September 14, 1999 80438 Japan October 25, 2000 Sony Music Japan, Epic ESCA 8239 Category:1999 albums Category:Celine Dion albums
title: Au cœur du stade
